Headline: #7 Harrison |Temporary Reroute near Harrison/Campbell
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted : due to, street blockage near Harrison/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted : due to, street blockage near Harrison/Campbell.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, California, Congress, Western and Harrison including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Van Buren, California and Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Columbus
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Columbus.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Columbus.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
